message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SI 

This paper belongs to the field of natural language processing (NLP) and specifically focuses on the usage of emojis in social media. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language) which deals with NLP and its applications. The paper also proposes a novel algorithm for predicting emoji combinations, which involves ranking sets of emoji combinations, indicating a possible connection to information retrieval (cs.IR). Additionally, the paper uses machine learning techniques to improve the prediction task, which falls under the sub-categories of cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Finally, the paper's focus on social media and its analysis of how emojis are used could also fall under the sub-category of cs.SI (Social and Information Networks).
